# repeatMode

**Instance Property**

Determines how the movie player repeats the playback of the movie.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeatMode: MPMovieRepeatMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieRepeatMode/none]. For a list of available repeat modes, see [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieRepeatMode].

## Controlling and monitoring playback

- **loadState**: The network load state of the movie player.
- **playbackState**: The current playback state of the movie player.
- **initialPlaybackTime**: The time, specified in seconds within the video timeline, when playback should start.
- **endPlaybackTime**: The end time (measured in seconds) for playback of the movie.
- **shouldAutoplay**: A Boolean that indicates whether a movie should begin playback automatically.
- **readyForDisplay**: A Boolean that indicates whether the first video frame of the movie is ready to be displayed.
- **timedMetadata**: Obtains the most recent time-based metadata provided by the streamed movie.
